changeSet.createView: SELECT ST.SPAWNER_TYPE_ID, MS.LEVEL, MC.CODE AS MONSTER_CLASS, MT.CODE AS MONSTER_TYPE, ST.PROBABILITY FROM REPOSITORY.SPAWNER_TYPE ST INNER JOIN REPOSITORY.MONSTER_TYPE MT ON MT.MONSTER_TYPE_ID=ST.MONSTER_TYPE_ID INNER JOIN REPOSITORY.MONSTER_SPAWNER MS ON MS.MONSTER_SPAWNER_ID=ST.MONSTER_SPAWNER_ID INNER JOIN REPOSITORY.MONSTER_CLASS MC ON MC.MONSTER_CLASS_ID=MS.MONSTER_CLASS_ID
